```{r setup, include=FALSE}
)

ggplot2::theme_set(hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum_rc())
```

```{r software, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(readxl)

software <- here("data-raw", "works.xlsx") %>%
  read_xlsx("software") %>%
  mutate(
    repo = case_when(
      !is.na(github) ~ github,
      !is.na(gitlab) ~ gitlab,
      !is.na(bitbucket) ~ bitbucket,
      TRUE ~ github
    )
  )
```

```{r with_homepage, results='asis'}
software %>%
  filter(!is.na(homepage)) %>%
  glue_data(
    "\n\n",
    "## {title}",
    "\n\n",
    "{description}",
    "\n\n",
    paste(shiny::icon("home"), "{homepage}"),
    "\n\n",
    paste(shiny::icon("github"), "{repo}"),
    "\n\n"
  )
```

```{r no_homepage, results='asis'}
software %>%
  filter(is.na(homepage)) %>%
  glue_data(
    "\n\n",
    "## {title}",
    "\n\n",
    "{description}",
    "\n\n",
    paste(shiny::icon("github"), "{repo}"),
    "\n\n"
  )
```
